query: SELECT c.id as cid, c.fullName, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM bills b WHERE b.customerId = c.id) as bills_count, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM proposals p WHERE p.customerId = c.id) as proposals_count, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM customerDocuments d WHERE d.customerId = c.id) as docs_count FROM customers c WHERE c.fullName LIKE '%Brian Vuong%';
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2p3K1dfddpGHimM.570595ac1fed --database P6CTqT8eNBMi3wEqmJdcEm --execute SELECT c.id as cid, c.fullName, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM bills b WHERE b.customerId = c.id) as bills_count, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM proposals p WHERE p.customerId = c.id) as proposals_count, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM customerDocuments d WHERE d.customerId = c.id) as docs_count FROM customers c WHERE c.fullName LIKE '%Brian Vuong%';
